entry.title: My first open source contribution to SerenityOS

link.title: My first open source contribution to SerenityOS

entry.summary: How can I contribute to open source software? Can I contribute with no prior development experience? Is it meant for beginners? If yes, is it very hard? These are some common questions many students find asking themselves. Well, I did, too. Hence I decided to share my experience contributing to SerenityOS — a graphical, Unix-like operating system for x86 computers — to help others contribute to...
